holidays.title: National Black Cat Day
holidays.description: Black cats need some positive PR to dispel their reputation as an omen of bad luck.

holidays.title: Cranky Co-Workers Day
holidays.description: Let's put on that fashionable frown and be irritable for a whole workday.

holidays.title: Masskara Festival
holidays.description: Join the annual and colorful MassKara Festival! Have fun partying on the streets of Bacolod, Philippines.

holidays.title: National Henry C. Ramos Day
holidays.description: Grab a tumbler, order a Ramos Gin Fizz, and indulge in this refreshing cocktail.

holidays.title: ​National Mentoring Day
holidays.description: The perfect time to think of a mentor that shaped you into who you are today.

holidays.title: National Mother-in-Law Day
holidays.description: These “second moms” are always there to help, contribute, and, sometimes, lovingly criticize.

holidays.title: National Tight End Day
holidays.description: America honors one of the game's most important yet unappreciated positions, the tight end.

holidays.title: Navy Day
holidays.description: We celebrate members of the naval warfare branch of the U.S. military.

holidays.title: Newport Wales Marathon
holidays.description: Get ready to explore the Newport Wales Marathon — held at one of the U.K's flattest tracks.

holidays.title: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Independence Day
holidays.description: Give the Vincentian Caribs a salute for their resilience and celebrate their well-deserved freedom today.

holidays.title: Visit A Cemetery Day
holidays.description: Grab a bunch of flowers and pay a visit to that long-lost friend at the cemetery.

holidays.title: World Day for Audiovisual Heritage
holidays.description: Let’s come together to archive audiovisual sources for our future generations’ benefit.

holidays.title: Claudia Sampedro’s Birthday
holidays.description: Claudia Sampedro a Model? Yes. Businesswoman? Yes. Beautiful? Obviously. Smart? Even more so.

holidays.title: Fran Lebowitz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Success did not spoil this famous author, speaker, and occasional actor. She has always been insufferable.

holidays.title: Hernando Desoto’s Birthday
holidays.description: From Nicaragua to Peru to the United States, De Soto left no stone unturned.

holidays.title: John Cleese’s Birthday
holidays.description: John Cleese is the most well-known member of the irreverent comic team that achieved legendary status.

holidays.title: Kelly Osbourne’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented daughter of Sharon and Ozzy Osbourne has successfully carved a niche for herself.

holidays.title: Lilbaby Lexi’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is nothing little about Lilbaby Lexi’s social media breakthrough and online presence.

holidays.title: Lonzo Ball’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’re all waiting to see what Lonzo Ball will do next. It will surely be amazing.

holidays.title: Malachi Bush’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Tik Tok star who occasionally raps too is the one to look out for!

holidays.title: Scott Weiland’s Birthday
holidays.description: The versatile singer left a rich musical legacy and a lasting impression on rock music.

holidays.title: Simon Le Bon’s Birthday
holidays.description: With a talent like no other, he’ll always be one of the legends.

holidays.title: Theodore Roosevelt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Theodore Roosevelt, the nation’s 26th President, was the youngest President at 42 years old!
